/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with buildings and trees, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The blue sky above contrasts beautifully with the earthy tones of the buildings and the greenery lining the street. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
